Hello! Welcome to the coin flipping game!!!

You can navigate to the different versions of the game by clicking on the buttons above!

'Flip one coin' will show you the result of a coin flip.

'Flip multiple coins' will show you the result of multiple coin flips (Click the "Flip" button to continue to flip coins).

'Guess the result' allows you to try and guess what side the coin will land on by clicking either heads or tails.

Click on 'Home' to reset!

Good luck and have fun!
